function.name: video_stop
function.description: This function is used to stop the playback of a video on a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to stop the video playback.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to stop the video playback.

appname.description: The app name associated with the video playback.

predefinedAppName.description: The predefined app name associated with the video playback.

title.description: The title of the video being played.

cast.description: The cast members of the video being played.
